title: #289 - Nihilism and (ugh) Black Pill Philosophy
itunes:title: #289 - Nihilism and (ugh) Black Pill Philosophy
description: Based off the suggestion of a listener, Connor and Dan reluctantly dig into the modern, hate-fueled nihilism that seems to be dominating a certain subsection of the internet. But first, they give a brief refresher course on nihilism in general and discuss whether any of it has any validity.
